programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A 1950s lawman (Leonardo DiCaprio) pursues a murderess who appears to have vanished from a locked room within a fortresslike psychiatric hospital.

programme.title: Movie

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A defense contractor hires an ex-marine to go to Panama to complete an arms deal. In the process, he becomes involved in the U.S. invasion of Panama.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldn't refuse.

programme.title: Movie

programme.title: Movie

programme.title: Movie

programme.title: Movie

programme.title: Movie
